items.text: short of a length at off stump, dropped into the off side off the back foot
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, 1 run

items.text: short of a length and wide outside off, left alone
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, no run

items.text: length ball lifts up and hits the handle as he looks to get forward and defend this
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, no run

items.text: length ball slanted into the corridor. Left alone
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, no run

items.text: past the inside edgeas this length ball stays low. He's deep in the crease to try and defend this outside off but isn't close to connecting
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, no run

items.text: nicely timed but straight to the fielder. Overpitched ball outside off and he gets his hands through this nicely
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, no run

items.text: length on off stump, blocked into the off side off the front foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, no run

items.text: steps out against  short of a length ball and watches closely to block it in the end
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, no run

items.text: short of a length outside off, punched to long-off on the up
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, 1 run

items.text: short of a length outside off, tapped to cover on the up
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, no run

items.text: length ball angled in at leg stump, clipped to deep midwicket off the back foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, 1 run

items.text: raps the pad but that's an arm ball, it's not straightening, it's hitting him in front of leg and it was delivered from wide of the crease. The lbw is turned down as Gayle misses on the flick
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, no run

items.text: full outside off. Mistimed drive bounces back down the pitch off the inside half of the bat
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, no run

items.text: length ball on the pads, tapped into the leg side with soft hands
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, 1 run

items.text: slaughtered. Short of a length ball on middle stump and he has backed away very early to make room and then whacked this over the off-side infield
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, FOUR runs

items.text: backs away again but this time he's forced to tap the length ball back past his partner
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, 1 run

items.text: shot. But point leaps to his left to save three runs. Lewis likes this short and wide ball and climbs into it. It's good work from the fielder to keep that to one
items.postText: That's 1000 runs for Evin Lewis. It's his 35th match.
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, 1 run

items.text: length on leg stump, tapped to mid-on on he up
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Gayle, 1 run

items.text: length and in at the stumps. Defended into the leg side
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, no run

items.text: tossed up wide outside off. Beaten in flight and forced to check his shot after shaping to drive
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, no run

items.text: slider at a length coming in on off stump. Blocked down the pitch
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, no run

items.text: short of a length ball punched back to the bowler, who misfields and allows him a run
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, 1 run

items.text: arm ball on leg stump, gets deep and tickles it to short fine's left off the pad
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Lewis, 1 leg bye

items.text: beaten. Plays inside the line of a slider in the corridor and it's past the outside edge
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Gayle, no run

items.text: full on middle stump, driven firmly to mid-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Lewis, 1 run
